verses.name: Deuteronomy 32:44
verses.text: And Moses came and spake all the words of this song in the ears of the people, he, and Hoshea the son of Nun.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 32:45
verses.text: And Moses made an end of speaking all these words to all Israel:

verses.name: Deuteronomy 32:46
verses.text: And he said unto them, Set your hearts unto all the words which I testify among you this day, which ye shall command your children to observe to do, all the words of this law.
